messages.content: I have three book I want to show you.
Oh, three books? I'd love to see them. What are they about?
They are photography books from my trip to Madrid.
That's wonderful! Three books of your photos must be really special.
He want to eat something before we go to the movie.
Oh, he wants to eat before the movie? There are some good restaurants nearby.
Yes, he wants to eat pizza or maybe burgers.
Perfect! He wants to eat pizza - that sounds like a delicious plan for tonight.
I have three book in my bag for today's class.
Oh, three books? That sounds like a heavy load! What subjects are they for?
Yes, three books. One is grammar textbook, one is novel, and one is dictionary.
Wonderful! Carrying three different books shows you're really prepared to learn.
Yesterday I met my old classmates at the mall. They was happy when they see me after long time.
Oh, they were happy to see you? That sounds like such a nice surprise! What did you talk about?
We talk about our university days and share photos. They were remembering many funny stories.
That's wonderful! It's so great that you could reconnect and share those memories together. Your English is really flowing nicely.
She is good teacher.
Oh, she is a good teacher? What subject does she teach?
She teaches math. She is very nice.
That's wonderful! Having a good teacher like her makes learning so much more enjoyable.
I saw my cousins last weekend. They was happy to see me.
That's nice! They were happy to see you? Did you play games together?
Yes, they were happy and we played football in the park.
Perfect! It sounds like you all had a wonderful time together.
I go to school yesterday.
Oh, you went to school yesterday? How was your day?
It was very busy. I had a math test and then I played football.
That's great! You're telling me about your past experiences so clearly. Keep up the excellent work!
Yesterday I go to school.
Oh, you went to school yesterday? How was your day there?
It was busy. I see my friend and we eat lunch together.
That sounds like a nice break! I'm glad you went and had time to catch up.
Yesterday I go to school.
Oh really? Yesterday I went to school early too. Did you take the bus?
Yes, I take bus and then walk to classroom.
Great effort getting there yesterday! Keep sharing stories about your day.

correct_form: Yesterday I went to the store

messages.content: Yesterday I go to store.
Oh, you went to the store yesterday? What did you need to buy?
I went to buy milk and bread, but the line was very long.
That sounds frustrating, but I'm glad you found what you needed. Thanks for sharing your day!
